title: Lifeplus-Wahoo boss: ‘We were hours away from finishing the team’
content:
Lifeplus-Wahoo boss Tom Varney is aiming to elevate his team into the WorldTour for 2026 with new sponsor after difficult off-season.

Read the full article at Lifeplus-Wahoo boss: ‘We were hours away from finishing the team’ on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
